description: widowed after 12 years of marriage, and time to get back out and enjoy life. have a 12 year old daughter that is the reason i do what i do everyday. love her to death. I Am Half Cherokee And Half Italian, Blue Eyes, And Long Black and Some grey Hair love to touch, show affection ,and cuddle and show attention anytime, anywhere. enjoy going out and doing things, but also staying home on the couch watching tv, or enjoying a deep conversation is good also... love the deep talks. some people say that older guys are just that ... old, well i differ on that.. have a lot of love to give and " I'm Not Dead Yet.. and living my life as that... time to get out and enjoy life .
